overview:
Ali brings to CloudArena a refined focus on the technical details and also helps to drive the vision and product experience for the company.

Prior to founding CloudArena, he led a team of engineers on critical projects and designed important solutions for banking, aerospace, hospitality and telecommunication industries. He involved on all technical levels from the application to the infrastructure components.

Ali also managed and executed number of projects, ranging from helping startups establish a technical platform, to strategic consulting for large enterprises at IBM.

Ali is adjunct faculty member at engineering department of a university. He has publications in international refereed journals and conferences about service and cloud computing. He is Advisory Chair for Software Service Computation at International Academy, Research and Industry Association. Ali is also a Ph.D. candidate in Computer Engineering, holding a M.Sc. in Computer Engineering and a B.A. in Economics.
